actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To protect national security against the threats posed by deepfake technology and to provide legal recourse to victims of harmful deepfakes.
